text:
Your New York #Covid19 #Vaccine #Equity Task Force led by @rorosado @NYSDOS has *failed* in its mission.

People who are incarcerated in #jails and #prisons in the state have less access to #vaccination than people in their home communities.

Shame on #VaccinateNY & @AndrewCuomo. https://t.co/mcYwyug28Q
